thread.title: Cruz Says Democrats Seek to Destroy the Country
thread.title_full: Cruz Says Democrats Seek to Destroy the Country

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Cruz Says Democrats Seek to Destroy the Country
text:
Cruz Says Democrats Seek to Destroy the Country October 14, 2015 
Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) said the Democratic debate highlighted “a recipe to destroy a country,” the Dallas Morning News reports. 
Said Cruz: “It was more socialism, more pacifism, more weakness and less Constitution.” 
He added: “We’re seeing our freedoms taken away every day and last night was an audition for who would wear the jackboot most vigorously. Last night was an audition for who would embrace government power for who would strip your and my individual liberties.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
